q2: Doesn't everyone consider Italy better than Portugal these days?
a2: I don't know, I think of Portugal on par with Italy based on some performances but I think they both are too interested in dramatics and need to just focus on good football on the field.
q3: I think Italy and dramatics on the pitch as always been a issue.
a3: Italy are on a downer at the moment.
q4: This article is from These Football Times
